Featured-image: CR740-peach-beaded-two-piece-evening-gown-with-pocket_p.jpg

----

Description: This beaded bodice with it's high neckline is sleek with its intricate beadwork and illusion design. The trim of the midriff is detailed with the same bead work and the full skirt falls to the floor with a short train. The skirt has pockets for a playful addition.
